Current CEO Eric Schmidt , 55, will assume the role of executive chairman, focusing on deals and government outreach, among other things. Google said other co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on strategic products. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said.
